entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 01:37 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
